page.title: 01Capel St Mary and Bentley
page.content: The area covered by this survey is mainly mixed farmland mainly arable. The area is divided by the A12 dual carriageway Capel St Mary being to the west of it and Bentley a mile and a half to the East. Both villages have expanded since the late Fifties,Capel St Mary having multiplied tremendously whereas Bentley has only doubled in size. The majority of the population works in either Ipswich 5 miles to the north or Colchester 15 miles to the south.Some, however,work locally and a few commute to London daily.
